tooltip_projectile.comment: Should be given a CcoProjectileRecord context, but if it is passed a unit ability details context reinitialises by grabbing projectile context

spread_parent.comment: Shows when have a spread range

callback_with_context.context_function_id: Join( DamageContext, ApDamageContext, BonusVsInfantryContext, BonusVsLargeContext, ExplosiveDamageContext, ExplosiveApDamageContext, EffectiveRangeContext, BaseReloadTimeContext )
